jokes: Why did the developer go broke? Because they used up all their cache.
I tried to catch some fog yesterday. Mist.
Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!
Why did the function stop calling? It had constant arguments.
Debugging: Removing the needles from the haystack.
encouragements: You’re doing better than you feel you are.
You are allowed to rest; that itself is progress.
You’ve handled tough before—you can handle this too.
